Method Detail

rename

public static LogicalVariable rename(LogicalVariable old)
Returns a new logical Variable name. Names generated have the following format: X{n}, where n is a number starting from 1.
The specified LogicalVariable is kept in a map so one can retrieve the old logical variable name later.

Parameters:
old - The logical variable to be renamed.
Returns:
The specified logical variable renamed.

rename

public static Substitution rename(java.util.Collection<LogicalVariable> oldVariables)
Returns a substitution that replaces the specified collection of logical variables with new names.

Parameters:
oldVariables - The logical variables to replace
Returns:
a substitution that replaces the specified collection of logical variables with new names.

reset

public static void reset()
Resets the count and clears the mapping of logical variables.

getOldNames

public static Substitution getOldNames()
Returns the substitution that restores logical variable old names.

Returns:
the substitution that restores logical variable old names.
